channel.title: dividend announcements on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in dividend announcements on FinanClub

item.title: PR
item.description: score:85 Chances: Permian Resources announces acquisition of Earthstone Energy, creating a premier Delaware Basin independent E&P. Positive announcements of quarterly cash dividends and portfolio optimization transactions. Improvement in 2023 guidance and potential for growth in the energy sector. Senior leadership changes and improved performance indicators.

item.title: KEY
item.description: score:5 Chances: KeyBank invests in community support and charitable donations. KeyCorp celebrates new branch openings and community partnerships. Positive dividend announcements and grants from KeyBank Foundation. KeyCorp’s growth potential and value as a value stock. KeyBank’s expansion of products and services for clients.
